languages.text: "Нам не доводилось много общаться — он предпочитал проводить время в своей часовне, в размышлениях. Технобрат Авель наделен Омниссией великой проницательностью, позволяющей видеть не общую картину бытия, но каждый из ее фрагментов в отдельности. Это сделало его логику отличной от логики прочих людей".

"We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."
languages.original_text: "Нам не доводилось много общаться — он предпочитал проводить время в своей часовне, в размышлениях. Технобрат Авель наделен Омниссией великой проницательностью, позволяющей видеть не общую картину бытия, но каждый из ее фрагментов в отдельности. Это сделало его логику отличной от логики прочих людей".

traits.locale_text: "We did not speak to each other much. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah had given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great acumen, which allowed him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. That made his logic different from that of other people."

"We did not speak to each other much. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah had given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great acumen, which allowed him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. That made his logic different from that of other people."

The Omnissiah had given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great acumen, which allowed him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. That made his logic different from that of other people."

The Omnissiah had given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great acumen, which allowed him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. That made his logic different from that of other people."

"We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

"We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

languages.text: "Wir haben nicht viel miteinander gesprochen. Er hat es vorgezogen, seine Zeit mit stiller Besinnung und Einkehr in seiner Kapelle zu verbringen. Der Omnissiah hatte Tech-Bruder Abel mit großem Scharfsinn gesegnet. Dadurch konnte er jede einzelne Facette der Existenz erkennen, anstatt nur die Gesamtansicht. Seine Logik ist daher anders als die anderer."
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben nicht viel miteinander gesprochen. Er hat es vorgezogen, seine Zeit mit stiller Besinnung und Einkehr in seiner Kapelle zu verbringen. Der Omnissiah hatte Tech-Bruder Abel mit großem Scharfsinn gesegnet. Dadurch konnte er jede einzelne Facette der Existenz erkennen, anstatt nur die Gesamtansicht. Seine Logik war daher anders als die anderer."

languages.text: « Nous ne nous sommes pas beaucoup parlé. Il préférait passer son temps à méditer, seul, dans sa chapelle. L'Omnimessie a conféré au technofrère Abel un don de perspicacité qui lui permet de discerner chacune des facettes de l'existence d'un individu plutôt que d'en avoir une vision globale. Raison pour laquelle sa logique est différente de celle des profanes. »
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne nous sommes pas beaucoup parlé. Il préférait passer son temps à méditer, seul, dans sa chapelle. L'Omnimessie avait conféré au technofrère Abel un don de perspicacité qui lui permettait de discerner chacune des facettes de l'existence d'un individu plutôt que d'en avoir une vision globale. Cela lui permettait d'avoir une logique différente de celle des profanes. »

languages.text: “我们彼此之间不怎么说话，他大部分时间都在小教堂里独自沉思。欧姆尼塞亚赋予了他某种非常敏锐的洞察，他可以辨别不同存在的各个方面，不仅仅只把它们视作整体。这使得他的思维方式与其他人大不相同。”
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: “我们彼此之间不怎么说话，他大部分时间都在小教堂里独自沉思。欧姆尼塞亚赋予了他某种非常敏锐的天赋，他可以辨别不同存在的各个方面，不仅仅只把它们视作整体。这使得他的思维方式与其他人大不相同。”

languages.text: 「我々は互いにあまり言葉を交わしてはいなかった。アベルは礼拝堂で孤独な思索にふけることを好んだ。万機神は技術同志アベルに優れた洞察力を授け、全体像ではなく、存在の個々の側面を見分けることを可能にしたのだ。それが彼の論理を他の人とは違うものにしていた」
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は互いにあまり言葉を交わしてはいなかった。アベルは礼拝堂で孤独な思索にふけることを好んだ。万機神はテックブラザー・アベルに優れた洞察力を授け、全体像ではなく、存在の個々の側面を見分けることを可能にしたのだ。それが彼の論理を他の人とは違うものにしていた」

languages.text: «No nos hablábamos mucho. Prefería dedicar su tiempo a reflexiones solitarias en su capilla. El Omnissiah había otorgado al tecnohermano Abel el don de la gran intuición, que le permitía discernir cada faceta individual de la existencia en lugar de la visión de conjunto. Eso hacía que su lógica fuera diferente a la de otras personas».
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: «No nos hablábamos mucho. Prefería dedicar su tiempo a reflexiones solitarias en su capilla. El Omnissiah había otorgado al tecnohermano Abel el don de la gran perspicacia, que le permitía discernir cada faceta individual de la existencia en lugar de la visión de conjunto. Eso hacía que su lógica fuera diferente a la de otras personas».

languages.text: "Fazla konuşmuşluğumuz yok. Zamanının çoğunu şapelinde inzivaya çekilip düşüncelere dalarak geçirmeyi tercih ederdi. Hermesih, Tekno Kardeş Abel'e varoluşa üstünkörü bakmaktan ziyade her bir yönünü ayırt etmesini sağlayan büyük bir görü yeteneği ihsan etmiş. Dolayısıyla mantığı diğer insanlarınkinden farklı işliyor."
languages.original_text: "We did not speak much to each other. He preferred to devote his time to solitary reflections in his chapel. The Omnissiah has given Tech-Brother Abel a gift of great insight, which allows him to discern each individual facet of existence rather than the overall view. This makes his logic different from that of other people."

traits.locale_text: "Fazla konuşmuşluğumuz yoktur. Zamanının çoğunu şapelinde inzivaya çekilip düşüncelere dalarak geçirmeyi tercih ederdi. Hermesih, Tekno Kardeş Abel'e büyük bir görü yeteneği ihsan etmiş, bu yüzdendir ki genel bir görüşe sahip olmaktansa tek tek bireylerin özelliklerini ayırt edebilir. Dolayısıyla mantığı diğer insanlarınkinden farklı işler."
